biography_text: STANTON, Greg, a Representative from Arizona; born in Phoenix, Maricopa County, Ariz., March 8, 1970; graduated from Cortez High School, Phoenix, Ariz.; B.A., Marquette University, Milwaukee, Wisc., 1992; J.D., University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Mich., 1995; lawyer, private practice; member of the Phoenix, Ariz., city council, 2000-2009; deputy attorney general, Arizona state attorney generalâs office, 2009-2011; Mayor of Phoenix, Ariz., 2012-2018; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Mich.
